CustomField.description: Used for Gift Receipt - populates Constituent Name or Organization Name
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__c), ucinn_ascendv2__Account__r.Name , ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__r.FirstName + " " + ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__r.MiddleName + " " + ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__r.LastName + " " + ucinn_ascendv2__Contact__r.Suffix )
CustomField.label: Gift Receipt Name
